uh is search engine optimization
complications uh and to understand why
search engine optimization is a problem
for single page applications you have to
understand how uh the how search engines
uh index the
websites so search Eng and index
websites through use of a process on
their servers uh called a WebCrawler
that will just go out and visit URLs it

server sends back parse it looking for
links and then it'll go visit those
those
links and when visiting those links
it'll parse the HTML look for links and
then it'll go and visit those links and
so in doing so it'll spider its way
crawl its way throughout your website uh
indexing the entire thing um but what it
doesn't do is it doesn't execute any
JavaScript when it goes and visits these
web pages so when you it goes and
attempts to visit a uh hashtag on the
end of your url uh it doesn't initiate
any JavaScript your page doesn't update
no new links are presented and it
doesn't go
anywhere uh fortunately even though

around for a
while so that uh the search agents have

URL remapping where it takes the uh it

point after the hashtag and uh rather
than going and visiting those URLs
directly it remaps it to question markor
Escape fragmentor equals and it goes and
it requests that page from your servers
so if you develop your servers so that

will now be able to be indexed by uh by
uh the web crawler and search
engines and it actually gives your

Advantage because you're able to segment

Analytics

application so the fourth and last

web application uh is the lack of error
tracking
in this traditional MVC
application uh most of the code resides

and moves on and anytime you want to go

and hey there's all your errors

and uh then and then nobody can use them
because 99% of your uh users aren't

the developers aren't going to be able
to see any of the errors uh because
they're on the client
side so the solution to this is to catch
these JavaScript errors uh either using
a TR catch block or using window.onerror
uh event handler and sending over Ajax
the errors back to the server uh and
then you can store these uh errors in a
